title: Bug 117981 - Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item again in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not selectable.
EB: The item should be selectable when attempting to select it for the first time in the library outline view.
SR:
1. Create a library file.
2. Add a label in the library file.
3. Open the library outline view.
4. Try to select the label item in the library outline view for the first time.
